Title: Song of the South
Writer: Dalton S. Reymond (screenplay), Morton Grant (screenplay), Maurice Rapf (screenplay), Dalton S. Reymond (original story), Joel Chandler Harris (book), Bill Peet (cartoon story), Ralph Wright (cartoon story), Vernon Stallings (cartoon story)
Actors: Ruth Warrick, Bobby Driscoll, James Baskett, Luana Patten
Plot: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.
